headline.main: Ex-Wife Says Trump Campaign CEO Made Anti-Semitic Remarks
headline.print_headline: Ex-Wife Says Trump Campaign CEO Made Anti-Semitic Remarks

docs.snippet: An ex-wife of Donald Trump's new campaign CEO, Stephen Bannon, said Bannon made anti-Semitic remarks when the two battled over sending their daughters to private school nearly a decade ago, according to court papers reviewed Friday by The Associat...
docs.lead_paragraph: An ex-wife of Donald Trump's new campaign CEO, Stephen Bannon, said Bannon made anti-Semitic remarks when the two battled over sending their daughters to private school nearly a decade ago, according to court papers reviewed Friday by The Associated Press.

headline.main: US: Clinton Calendars Won't Be Released Until After Election
headline.print_headline: US: Clinton Calendars Won't Be Released Until After Election

docs.snippet: Seven months after a federal judge ordered the State Department to begin releasing monthly batches of the detailed daily schedules showing meetings by Hillary Clinton during her time as secretary of state, the government told The Associated Press ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Seven months after a federal judge ordered the State Department to begin releasing monthly batches of the detailed daily schedules showing meetings by Hillary Clinton during her time as secretary of state, the government told The Associated Press it won't finish the job before Election Day.

headline.main: Despite Progress, US-Russia Fall Short on Truce for Syria
headline.print_headline: Despite Progress, US-Russia Fall Short on Truce for Syria

docs.snippet: The United States and Russia say they have resolved a number of issues standing in the way of restoring a nationwide truce to Syria and opening up aid deliveries, but were unable once again to forge a comprehensive agreement on stepping up coopera...
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States and Russia say they have resolved a number of issues standing in the way of restoring a nationwide truce to Syria and opening up aid deliveries, but were unable once again to forge a comprehensive agreement on stepping up cooperation to end the brutal war that has killed hundreds of thousands.

headline.main: Trump's Reversals Move Him Closer to Politics as Usual
headline.print_headline: Trump's Reversals Move Him Closer to Politics as Usual

docs.snippet: As he powered through his rivals in the Republican primary, Donald Trump sold himself as the "tell-it-like-it-is" candidate, a brash truth-teller whose policy pronouncements wouldn't be swayed by the polls....
docs.lead_paragraph: As he powered through his rivals in the Republican primary, Donald Trump sold himself as the "tell-it-like-it-is" candidate, a brash truth-teller whose policy pronouncements wouldn't be swayed by the polls.

headline.main: 'Religious Vote' Hears Messages From Both Candidates
headline.print_headline: 'Religious Vote' Hears Messages From Both Candidates

docs.snippet: Republican Donald Trump has told conservative evangelical pastors in Florida that his presidency would preserve "religious liberty" and reverse what he insists is a government-enforced muzzling of Christians....
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican Donald Trump has told conservative evangelical pastors in Florida that his presidency would preserve "religious liberty" and reverse what he insists is a government-enforced muzzling of Christians.

headline.main: Cespedes, Syndergaard Help Mets Rout Phillies Again, 12-1
headline.print_headline: Cespedes, Syndergaard Help Mets Rout Phillies Again, 12-1

docs.snippet: Yoenis Cespedes clocked a three-run homer, Kelly Johnson had a pinch-hit grand slam and Noah Syndergaard pitched two-hit ball over seven innings as the resurgent New York Mets routed the Philadelphia Phillies 12-1 on Saturday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yoenis Cespedes clocked a three-run homer, Kelly Johnson had a pinch-hit grand slam and Noah Syndergaard pitched two-hit ball over seven innings as the resurgent New York Mets routed the Philadelphia Phillies 12-1 on Saturday night.

headline.main: Warning of 'War' on Farmers, Trump Seeks Support in Iowa
headline.print_headline: Warning of 'War' on Farmers, Trump Seeks Support in Iowa

docs.snippet: Donald Trump warned Saturday of a "war on the American farmer," telling a crowd in Iowa that rival Hillary Clinton "wants to shut down family farms" and implement anti-agriculture policies....
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump warned Saturday of a "war on the American farmer," telling a crowd in Iowa that rival Hillary Clinton "wants to shut down family farms" and implement anti-agriculture policies.
